skills.name: Particle Arc
skills.description:
[SP: 0][CD: 0] Use the bow to aim and shoot (max aiming duration: 3s), dealing 600.0% ATK of Physical DMG. Hitting an enemy weakspot deals 800.0% ATK of Physical DMG and consumes 30 SP (if SP is above 30) to drop 1 SP Pack nearby. Picking up the SP Pack restores 15SP for the team.
The weapon active's CD and charging time are based on the shooting mode.

skills.name: Magnetic Field Pulse
skills.description: Team's Total DMG increases by 6.0% (cannot stack). Upon entry, wielder restores 30 SP. CD: 60s.
